resources.string: How soon do you want to bail?

string-array.name: text_options
string-array.item: Hey its me! Want to let me in? Where are you?
Hi sweetie. I just wanted to know if ur available? Im at your place right now.
Would you mind filling in for me in like, 15 min? Sorry for the short notice!!
Hey so I have a flight in like, an hour, and Im locked out. SOS.
